pages.text: With these rare gems I've found, each one has its own unique properties. I would like to try them as equipment, but it seems they are unable to be melded on its own.

By using a $(l:innovation/burn/stoked_flame)stoked cauldron$(), it seems that I am able to combine the gems with $(l:innovation/metallurgy/steel)crucible steel$() to make a proper gem alloy capable of being formed into tools and armor for my needs.
